title: Textile, 1995-50-267, ca. 1795
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp: 154 cm (21 1/4in.). Weft: (left selvage only) 88cm (34 1/2in.)
Height of plate: 104.5cm (41in.)
description: Man seated on a chair before a crown Queen of France, horsemen carrying the standard of France, angel holding a crown over the head of a sleeping warrior, trumpeting angel escorting the Cross, amorous scenes, Fontainbleu palace and other scenes. In sepia on natural.
